archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Document Connector
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation:
Allows CMS content to link to document store - clicking on this opens new window on to the file stored in public.uwe.ac.uk
The filestore is structured in a special way (Sharepoint 2007) to allow for this connection.
UWE wrote this instead of standard document store connector.
A future CMS will prob have Sharepoint connector, but might not be compatible structure, would be better off going with a doc store with future CMS
